survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Green Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and engagement with the company's sustainability and green initiatives in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's current green initiatives and sustainability programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale for single-choice response. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's current green initiatives and sustainability programs?

questions.question_text: Which of the following green initiatives are you aware of in our workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Consider randomizing option order to prevent bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following green initiatives are you aware of in our workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the implementation of green initiatives in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected at least one initiative in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Include 'Not applicable' if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the implementation of green initiatives in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected at least one initiative in Q2

questions.question_text: What additional green initiatives would you like to see implemented in our workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What additional green initiatives would you like to see implemented in our workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future workplace sustainability programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for likelihood measurement. Ensure clear labeling of scale points.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future workplace sustainability programs?
